body:
Hey, Ive been into making resource packs ALOT lately, and I realised why not make one for laggy users?

So here it is =)

Pictures: http://imgur.com/BzME8W1,dApdoI8,GxnfpIZ,oAbHbBw,KB0ksaG,LtMnzGS,89I3w39,VeuztBb,ea8sepd,UDzG9pj,JuY...


Download:http://www.mediafire.com/download/sl9mjxc3hynlc8g/%C2%A7k1+%C2%A75Sevo%27s+%C2%A74Red+++%C2%A72+and+...
Feel free to make a video =)

title: My Red and Green FPS pack

replies.body:
I'll test it out :)

EDIT: I love it! It's great, and has no lag like you say. 10/10 +1
It also still has quite a lot of detail.
replies.body_tagged:
I'll test it out :)

EDIT: I love it! It's great, and has no lag like you say. 10/10 +1
It also still has quite a lot of detail.

replies.body:
Using it right now, looks good. And has improved my FPS a little bit, thank you! :)

Edit: Improved my FPS much more. :P
replies.body_tagged:

Looks great!
This definitely improved my FPS. :D

Thanks!

And btw, the blocks are from the StanMPL pack, dont hate xD

replies.body:
Great job, I like it!

The only thing I don't like that much is the fire colors, they take too much attention for my opinion :c 
Otherwise, amazing pack and if I will ever make a video again xD I will use it.
replies.body_tagged:
Great job, I like it!

The only thing I don't like that much is the fire colors, they take too much attention for my opinion :c 
Otherwise, amazing pack and if I will ever make a video again xD I will use it.

replies.body: This actually looks quite nice, good job.
replies.body_tagged: This actually looks quite nice, good job.

replies.body: Is the crosshair suppose to be only half?
replies.body_tagged: Is the crosshair suppose to be only half?

replies.body:
The normal MC crosshair isnt centered, its actually 12 pixels off, and I edited it so it would be in the middle, and there was no place for the second half...

Watch this for proof 

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=CRf1obQD1FU
